text: læa reā midị̂ s̄̀ng rx sū l khn dı nxkcāk d̂wy kār phūd p̣hās̄ʹā chnchāti k̄hxng k̄heā pheụ̄̀x ca dị̂ chī̂cæng xỳāng chạd cæ̂ng kæ̀ phwk k̄heā xạllxḥˌ ca thrng h̄ı̂ p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ h̄lng thāng læa thrng chī̂næa thāng kæ̀ p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ thrng pras̄ngkh̒ læa phraxngkh̒ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng dechānup̣hāph p̄hū̂thrng prīchā ỵāṇ
